== Installation
=== Eclipse
Install Eclipse. See http://www.vogella.com/tutorials/Eclipse/article.html"> Eclipse IDE for installing and using Eclipse.
Eclipse has http://www.vogella.com/tutorials/ApacheAnt/article.html"> Apache Ant integrated. Therefore, no additional installation for Ant is required.
=== Docbook and Stylesheets
Download the Docbook DTD in version 4.5 and the latest version of the XSLT stylesheets.
http://www.oasis-open.org/docbook/xml/4.5"> DocBook DTD in version 4.5
http://sourceforge.net/projects/docbook/files/docbook-xsl/"> XSLT stylesheets
=== XSL processor
The download link for Saxon is: http://saxon.sourceforge.net/"> http://saxon.sourceforge.net/.
Download the version 6.5.5 as newer Saxon versions do not work well with DocBook 4.5. Saxon 9 is an XSLT 2.0 processor and the current official version of the XSL stylesheets are XSLT 1.0 based.
Download the `saxon.zip` file. The `saxon.jar` is later needed.
=== Issues
Sometimes running the XSLT conversion results in the following error message.
In this case try adding the xerces-j XML parser to your build path and see if that resolves the error.
